U.S. Crypto Tax Proposal Lets Miners Off the Hook, Snares ‘Some’ Decentralized Exchanges https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2023/08/25/us-crypto-tax-proposal-lets-miners-off-hook-snares-some-decentralized-exchanges/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines CDUDV5KYHJHINOZBHRTJYDEROM Jesse Hamilton, Nikhilesh DeThe U.S. Treasury Department has finally unveiled its definition of a "broker" for the crypto industry, defining how crypto companies and investors will need to meet tax reporting obligations and answering a years-old question over whether decentralized finance platforms and miners will need to gather their users' personal data. Fri, 25 Aug 2023 12:45:00 +0000 2023-08-25T15:57:14.626+00:00 PolicynewsRegulationsInfrastructure BillIRSU.S. Treasury Departmenttaxesbrokertop newsThe U.S. Treasury Department unveiled its definition of a "broker" for crypto tax reporting purposes in response to a controversial provision in the 2021 Infrastructure Investment and Jobs Act. (Nikhilesh De/CoinDesk)
